director.name: 弗雷德·斯科特 Fred Scott

introduction: PAYDAY, directed by FRED&NICK and narrated by George the Poet, is a unique performance documentary set in the heart of Croydon, which delves into the finances and lives of four twenty-somethings. The documentary follows the highs and lows of Generation Y as they cope in one of the toughest economic times since the 1930s. The film focuses on the contrasting lives of our diverse cast from the moment they receive their 'payday' money to how they go on to spend, save or squander it.
